attributes.action: Rethink the abolition of the 10p tax rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the introduction of the new income tax rates many people on low incomes have suffered a decrease in income, whilst the cost of living has increased. The PM has said that these people can claim tax credits to help them, but those under 25 and without children cannot claim. This will push many people onto the brink of poverty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
